Testing FADDP instruction
FADDP performs floating-point addition and pops the register stack

Test case 1:
Operand A: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Operand B: 2.00000000000000000000 (0x40008000000000000000)
Result: 3.00000000000000000000 (0x4000c000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 
PASS
